hints.content:
$230 +{\goldE{?}}= 378$

![A number line with 2 points labeled. An arrow from point 230 to point 378 is labeled, plus question mark.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/0bcb2b4913e797dddd4d58ecd037a4f7e0af1ec0)

Let's start by adding hundreds to ${230}$ until we get as close to  ${378}$ as possible without going over ${378}$.

$\begin{align}
{230} +\purpleD{100}=330
\end{align}$

If we add $\purpleD{1 \text{ hundred}}$, or $\purpleD{1 00}$, we reach $330$. We cannot add any more hundreds without going over ${378}$.

![The same number line, with an arrow from point 230 to a new point 330 labeled, "plus 100"](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/b319ea8c8e3ec02eff5b6c7ce7e8ff006ce8f5f4)

Next, let's add tens to $330$ until we get as close to  ${378}$ as possible without going over ${378}$.

$\begin{align}
330 +\blueD{10}=340\\\\
{340} +\blueD{10}= 350\\\\
{350} +\blueD{10}= 360\\\\
{360} +\blueD{10}= 370
\end{align}$

If we add $\blueD{4 \text{ tens}}$, or $\blueD{40}$, we reach $370$. We cannot add any more tens without going over ${378}$.

![The same number line, with an arrow from point 330 to a new point 370 labeled, "plus 40"](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/a7af956880a0f172eb7b93f01ece194ecc0af6ea)

Finally, how many ones should we add to  $370$ to get to  ${378}?$

$370 +\greenD{8}={378}$

![The same number line, with an arrow from point 370 to point 378 labeled, "plus 8"](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/b0fa98af23991d9a6c444ea7514b4f3d118be069)

We added $\purpleD{1 \text{ hundred}}$, $\blueD{4 \text{ tens}}$, and $\greenD{8\text{ ones}}$ to ${230}$ to get to ${378}$.

$\purpleD{1 00}+\blueD{4 0}+\greenD{8}=\goldE{148}$

![The number line with all of the arrows shown. The original arrow from point 230 to point 378 is labeled, "plus 148." The arrows spans the arrows labeled "plus 100," "plus 40," and "plus 8."](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/d81094d25599fb8fe125f629b7f4240e38393833)

question.content:

$230 + {}$ [[â˜ƒ numeric-input 1]] ${} = 378$
